title: Bandhan Life offers new plans
description: Bandhan Life, previously Aegon Life Insurance, has launched its operations with two new products: a guaranteed savings plan and a unit linked plan. The company, acquired by Bandhan Financial Holdings in February, plans to introduce three more products within three months. A strategic partnership with Bandhan Bank will facilitate distribution of these insurance products across West Bengal, Assam, and Odisha.
